synopsis.text: This brief tale introduces us to Ai, a college student who embarks on an unplanned journey to Kobe, Japan, finding herself unsure of what to explore. Her fortune changes when she encounters Kazami Kei, an extraordinary figure donning a black tracksuit and resembling a giant chicken. Despite his busy life, Kazami takes it upon himself to show Ai the wonders of Kobe, from the exhilarating Harborland amusement park to the unique rotating caf√©s, and the captivating Nunobiki Falls. As they traverse the city together, Kazami hopes to reveal to Ai the hidden gems that make Kobe truly special.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
